title: UMBRA CACAO â€” From the Shadow of the Bean, the Light of the Bar.
description: A luxury single-origin chocolate atelier landing page for the fictional brand UMBRA CACAO (Shadow Cacao). Deep cacao-brown palette with warm harvest gold accents, animated pulsing dot grid hero canvas, seven-origins horizontal scroll with farm GPS coordinates, 8-stage production process with sensory notes, tasting archive of past editions, philosophy grid, and commission-your-origin form. Seven bars per year, one farm per bar.
